descriptionEn: mr defendant person has until 17 December 2024 to respond. They can request an extra 28 days if they need it.
descriptionCy: Mae gan mr defendant person hyd at 17 Rhagfyr 2024 i ymateb. Gallant ofyn am 28 diwrnod ychwanegol os oes arnynt angen hynny.

params.djDefendantNotificationMessage: <u>make an application to set aside (remove) or vary the judgment</u>
params.djDefendantNotificationMessageCy: <u>wneud cais i roi’r dyfarniad o’r naill du (ei ddileu) neu amrywio’r dyfarniad</u>
params.djClaimantNotificationMessage: <u>make an application to vary the judgment</u>
